parameters.name: AuditStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the security audit feature. Valid values:

*   **0**: no
*   **1**: yes

parameters.name: AutoScan
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically trigger a re-scan after a rule is modified. Valid values:

*   **0**: no
*   **1**: yes

> When a re-scan is triggered, DSC scans all data in your data asset.

parameters.name: EngineType
parameters.description:
The database engine that is run by the instance. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **SQLServer**

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description:
The unique ID of the data asset for which you want to modify configuration items.

> You can call the [DescribeDataLimits](~~DescribeDataLimits~~) operation to query the ID of the data asset.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: LogStoreDay
parameters.description:
The retention period of raw logs after you enable the security audit feature. Unit: days. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **90**
*   **180**
*   **365**

parameters.name: ModifyPassword
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to change the username and password that are used to log on to the ApsaraDB RDS database. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes
*   **false**: no

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password used to log on to the ApsaraDB RDS database that you authorize DSC to access.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port that is used to connect to the database.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The name of the service to which the data asset belongs. Valid values:

*   **1**: MaxCompute
*   **2**: Object Storage Service (OSS)
*   **3**: AnalyticDB for MySQL
*   **4**: Tablestore
*   **5**: ApsaraDB RDS

parameters.name: SamplingSize
parameters.description:
The number of sensitive data samples tht are collected after sensitive data detection is enabled. Valid values:

*   **0**
*   **5**
*   **10**

parameters.name: SecurityGroupIdList
parameters.description: The security group that is used by PrivateLink when you install the DSC agent.

parameters.name: ServiceRegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the data asset resides. Valid values:

*   **cn-beijing**: China (Beijing)
*   **cn-zhangjiakou**: China (Zhangjiakou)
*   **cn-huhehaote**: China (Hohhot)
*   **cn-hangzhou**: China (Hangzhou)
*   **cn-shanghai**: China (Shanghai)
*   **cn-shenzhen**: China (Shenzhen)
*   **cn-hongkong**: China (Hong Kong)

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The username used to log on to the ApsaraDB RDS database that you authorize DSC to access.

parameters.name: VSwitchIdList
parameters.description: The vSwitch that is used by PrivateLink when you install the DSC agent.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the data asset belongs.
